articles.title: EU cracks show after China’s ‘friend’ Hungary breaks ranks to strike deal with Beijing - Daily Express
articles.description: THE EUROPEAN UNION's cracks are showing after 'friendly' Hungary broke ranks to work with China, and now Beijing's foreign minister has boasted of improved relations with Ireland, Serbia and Poland.

articles.author: Hanna Ziady, CNN Business
articles.title: Europe opens twin antitrust investigations into Facebook - CNN
articles.description: Facebook is confronting two separate antitrust investigations by European regulators that will probe whether the social network's use of data gives it an unfair advantage in online advertising.

articles.title: EU and UK open antitrust investigations into Facebook Marketplace - The Verge
articles.description: The European Commission and UK’s Competition and Markets Authority have opened an investigation into Facebook Marketplace. There are concerns Facebook is unfairly using advertiser data to compete with rivals.
